Title: Narendra Modi crossed ‘red line’ by talking about Balochistan, says Pakistan
Content: Pakistan on Thursday said Narendra Modi crossed the “red line” by talking about Balochistan and asserted that it will “forcefully” raise the Kashmir issue at the U.N. General Assembly session next mo
Author: PTI
Description: Pakistan on Thursday said Narendra Modi crossed the “red line” by talking about Balochistan and asserted that it will “forcefully” raise the Kashmir issue at the U.N. General Assembly session next mo
